description: This file defines a custom enumeration class 'ExtendedEnum' that extends the standard Enum class with additional utility methods for listing values and converting from strings.

classes.name: ExtendedEnum
classes.description: A subclass of Enum that adds methods for retrieving all enum values as a list and creating enum instances from strings.

methods.name: values_list
methods.description: Returns a list of all enum member values.

methods.name: from_str
methods.description: Converts a string to the corresponding enum member, case-sensitive. Raises NotImplementedError if the string does not match any member.
